author: Special Correspondent
text:
Revenue Divisional Officer P. Fermi Vidhya (second from left) inaugurating special sale in Tirunelveli on Monday.— Photo: A. Shaikmohideen

The Tamil Nadu Handloom Weavers’ Cooperative Society’s ‘Buy two, get one free’ sale commenced at Gandhimathi Showroom in Tirunelveli Junction on Monday.

In a simple function held at the showroom, Revenue Divisional Officer, Tirunelveli, P. Fermi Vidhya inaugurated the special sale and Joy Benjamin, Principal, Rose Mary Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Palayamkottai, received the first sale of saris.

The ‘Buy two, get one free’ scheme, which was introduced in 2012, will be available till March 28.

“We’ve brought additional stocks that include lightweight silk saris, cotton saris, blankets, bed-spreads, dhotis, towels, readymade shirts, linen shirts etc. for this special sale,” said N. Karthikeyan Nair, Regional Manager, Co-Optex, Tirunelveli.

During this special sale last year, Co-Optex transacted business to the tune of Rs. 67.34 lakh, including the Gandhimathi Showroom’s share of Rs. 35.84 lakh.

“This year’s sales target under this scheme is Rs.1 crore,” Mr. Nair said.

Gandhimathi Co-Optex Showroom Manager S. Vaithilingam was present.
title: ‘Buy two, get one free’ sale by Co-Optex
